name: A First Introduction
desc: Our first exhibit is an exploration of the various types of models that we feature on this site. It includes two full body models, two genital close-ups, a breast model, a lower body model and a set of buttocks.

name: Vulva Exhibit
desc: A more detailed view at vulvas, including compoung model of an excited/not-excited vulva

name: Penis Exhibit
desc: A collection of penises, with a circumcised penis and an erect penis
